key_risks: Customer concentration risk with heavy reliance on Apple Inc.
Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on third-party foundries and geopolitical tensions
Intense competitive pressures from companies like Qorvo, Broadcom, and Qualcomm
Regulatory risks from stringent export controls and U.S.-China trade relations
IT upgrade challenges impacting business continuity
controversies: Forced labor policies disclosure ranking 18th out of 40 companies
Employee concerns about work-life balance and management practices
environmental_issues: Commitment to reducing carbon footprint and improving energy efficiency
social_issues: Employee sentiment issues impacting talent retention and company culture
governance_issues: Regulatory compliance challenges in the semiconductor industry
